    • getOptimalMode

      public DistanceMode getOptimalMode()
      Sets the distance mode of the sensor based on the provided distance.

      RangingMode.Short: if distance less than 1250 mm RangingMode.Medium: if 1250 mm less than or equal too distance less than 2250 mm RangingMode.Long: if distance greater than or equal to 2250 mm

      Specified by:
      getOptimalMode in interface RangeSensor
